title: Q&A for Managing manure beyond the farmyard: Manure management for less-typical species and settings

tasks.task: Participate in a Q&A session about farming practices.
subtasks: Answer questions regarding waste management and utilization for aquaculture.

Discuss the challenges and opportunities in raising non-indigenous fish species for aquaculture.

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Participate in a Q&A session about farming practices. Seems like the main task here is to engage in such a Q&A. Let's get the subtasks listed.

the main tasks pertain to utilizing cold-digested fish byproducts and alligator manure through precise irrigation, highlighting the physical involvement in farm waste management. **MAINTASK: Set up and operate agricultural irrigation systems for the application of repurposed animal waste.**
